project.name: BWMaven TIBCO BusinessWorks project mavenizer
project.description:
This archetype will create a POM that inherits from FC TIBCO Factory parent POM *OR* from the client's root POM created with 'archetype-client-root-project' archetype.
This POM will be the Maven configuration for the existing TIBCO BW project.
1) you want to use the default FC TIBCO Factory parent, then replace the 'rootProjectGroupId', 'rootProjectArtifactId' & 'rootProjectVersion' by the content of 'fcFactoryGroupId', 'fcFactoryArtifactId' & 'fcFactoryVersion' respectively.
2) you want to use your own parent created with 'archetype-client-root-project', then replace 'rootProjectGroupId', 'rootProjectArtifactId' & 'rootProjectVersion' by the values of your own parent (ex: 'com.company.project', 'project-root', '1.0.0').
